caller_intent: Jason Harkey is requesting a corrected Certificate of Insurance (COI) for FCR Holdings LLC, ensuring it includes 'DBA First Class Roofing,' and needs it urgently for Stone Development. He also mentions a follow-up request for Wolf Holmes.
resolution_steps: Gloria confirms she can check and send the corrected COI.
Jason requests the COI be sent immediately for Stone Development.
Gloria mentions she will send an email for Wolf Holmes later today.
knowledge_required: Handling business name (DBA) corrections on insurance policies
Managing urgent client requests for insurance certificates
summary: Jason Harkey requested a corrected COI for FCR Holdings LLC with the DBA name included, emphasizing urgency for Stone Development. Gloria confirmed she would send the corrected document and mentioned handling a follow-up request for Wolf Holmes later. The call concluded with mutual agreement on the resolution steps.
